metadata.title: CVE-2021-36713 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Cross Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the DataTables plug-in 1.9.2for jQuery allows attackers to run arbitrary code via the sBaseNameparameter to function _fnCreateCookie. NOTE: 1.9.2 is a version from 2012.

criterions.comment: datatables.js package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
